abstract: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China celebrates an expansion in Europe and finds a willing host in France.
snippet: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China celebrates an expansion in Europe and finds a willing host in France.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — As President Hu Jintao kicked off a four-day visit to Washington on Tuesday highlighting China’s rising economic might, the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China was busy flexing its muscle on the other side of the Atlantic.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

abstract: Most large countries spend between one and four times as much on computer hardware as they do on computer on computer software. China spends 12 times as much. What’s wrong with that picture?
snippet: Most large countries spend between one and four times as much on computer hardware as they do on computer on computer software. China spends 12 times as much. What’s wrong with that picture?
lead_paragraph: Intellectual property is one of the big economic issues between China and the United States. American business executives and government officials believe Chinese companies steal large amounts of intellectual property from foreign companies. China does have laws against such piracy, but they are often not enforced.
